physical_appearance: "The image shows three newspaper clippings that are pasted onto a light purple paper. There are several punched holes at its left side. ""The Great Soprano sat up and listened""
title_text: Details about Joan Hammond's concert and her words of encouragement to a young singer Joan Hammond concert programme and related newspaper cuttings
subject_terms_1: ""Praise from Miss Hammond"" opera singers celebrities conductors concerts
subject_terms_2: and ""Joan Hammond sings to packed audience"" are the respective headlines of the three  newspaper clippings. The clipping on the left hand side contians a picture depicting a man playing a piano while a young lady stands and sings close by. The clipping on the upper right side features two ladies and a male sitting by a piano." Hammond, Joan, 1912 - 1996 Susskind, Walter, 1913-1980 Celebrities Concerts
